Température piscine top.

reviews.positive_text: Hotel design neuf bien étudié avec emplacement de rêve tout près du lac. Equipe à l'écoute, efficace et souriante. La vue sur le lac est époustouflante.
reviews.negative_text: Au global, c'est plus une experience d'un excellent 4 etoiles.

reviews.review_title: super séjour quelques détails à régler mais dans l’ensemble établissement top !
reviews.positive_text:
l’emplacement plus que parfait vue magique!!! 
établissement récent et moderne.Personnel au petit soin.
reviews.negative_text: malheureusement carte des vins peu fournie et pas de vins bio ou nature.Attention ne pas prendre la chambre Luca suite junior vue forêt vu sur les blocs climatisations extérieur et voisinage ainsi que les pauses cigarettes du personnels
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text:
Le service apporté par le personnel était incroyable ! tous d’une extrême gentillesse. 
Julien, membre d’accueil dans l’hôtel, a été très disponible pour nous et nous a recommandé une liste de restaurant à faire selon nos goûts. 
les chambres étaient toujours super bien préparé par Laura. 
les lieux sont exceptionnels au pied du lac, le dépaysement est 100% garanti.
reviews.negative_text: la vue forêt est en fait une vue majoritairement sur la route départementale, même si la forêt est présente au loin !
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text: Personnel, chambres, localisation, accessibilité, magnifique vue (sans doute une des plus belles), accès direct sur la piste cyclable et au lac sans devoir traverser de route, calme
reviews.negative_text: Quelques petits aspects pratiques, ex. rien pour pendre maillot et essuie dans la salle de bain, pas de rideau de douche. Il manque l'effet "ouaw" qu'un 5 étoiles doit procurer...

reviews.review_title: gastronomiquement parfait et dépaysant à souhait.
reviews.positive_text: le design des chambres, le silence, l’amabilité du personnel, la qualité du restaurant et de sa chef, vraiment très bien. la qualité de la terrasse du restaurant et du bar. petit détail, dans les chambres, les placards pour pendre les vêtements ne ferment pas car leur profondeur est trop courte et les cintres sont de travers et empêchent la fermeture totale. du coup l’éclairage du placard la nuit est une gêne d’où la nécessité de mettre peu d’Affaires et les mettre en bas. seule erreur de conception pour moi, un détail…
reviews.negative_text:
un peu d’attente au bar mais rien de dramatique,
la qualité du Spa, bonne sans plus.
chambre vue route
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text: Oui
reviews.negative_text: Toit tordu
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text: Hôtel à la hauteur de ces prestations

Hôtel vraiment exceptionnel , rien à redire. Que du positifs sur tout les points. 
Le personnel est adorable, toujours à l’écoute et au petit soins si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit, la propreté des chambres et des parties communes est irréprochable. 
Petit déjeuner ainsi que le restaurant sont très bons avec des produits frais. 

Le cadre de l’hôtel est génial , avec la vue sur le lac ainsi que la piscine extérieur , tout cela dans un cadre verdoyant. 

Petite intention adorable dans la chambre à notre arrivée , nous avions des cookies préparés par le restaurant de l’hôtel avec un petit mot d’accueil.  

Un grand merci à Noémie, qui nous a offert un véritable moment de détente grâce à ses soins et massages.

Nous reviendrons sans hésitation 😊😊

reviews.review_title: Extraordinaire ! Calme et lux. Au top !
reviews.positive_text:
Personnel extrêmement sympathique ! Je recommande fortement cet hôtel, rien à redire.
Encore un grand merci à Eric pour sa sympathie, son professionnalisme et sa réactivité suite à une crevaison de pneu..
Tout etait parfait l accueil le lieu l emplacement la chambre le petit dejeuner juste top...il n y a rien a dire quand tout est parfait

reviews.positive_text: Séjour très agréable en famille. L’hôtel est extrêmement bien situé, la vue sur le lac est magnifique. La chambre est spacieuse et très bien équipée. Le nettoyage est vraiment irréprochable. Le personnel est aimable et serviable, tout est réuni pour être pleinement détendu. Le restaurant propose des plats de qualité. Nous sommes plus que ravis de notre séjour !

reviews.review_title: Un magnifique séjour dans un cocon intimiste
reviews.positive_text: Tout : la qualité d’accueil, la décoration et le confort de la chambre, les petites attentions à notre arrivée, le confort intimiste de l’hôtel. Une véritable déconnection

Le personnel est adorable et le spa très agréable !
Un vrai havre de paix où nous reviendrons avec plaisir ! 
Merci à toute l’équipe !
reviews.negative_text:
- petit déjeuner excessivement cher (35€ par personne!) 
- façade de l’hôtel (côté parking) pas à la hauteur d’un hôtel 5 étoiles : manque d’entretien et décevant des l’arrivée car pas d’effet « wahou… » ! Heureusement, la vue de l’autre côté nous fait oublier cette arrivée quelque peu décevante ;-) mais un rafraîchissement et embellissement serait appréciable !

reviews.review_title: Excellent séjour au calme et reposant!
reviews.positive_text:
Emplacement idéal, au calme face au lac
Personnel chaleureux et très pro
La chambre (suite côté forêt) était bien agencée, taille cohérente.
Petit déjeuner très complet et excellent 
Espace Spa de qualité et calme! 

Enfin petit coup de cœur pour le restaurant (et je pèse mes mots car nous avons l'habitude de cette catégorie de restaurant), c'était divin, on notera aisément le sublime travail des sauces dont une réduction exceptionnelle avec le plat de langoustine, bravo au chef!!  

Merci à toute l'équipe et à bientôt assurément!

literie

reviews.review_title: Absolument fabuleux pour un mois de novembre
reviews.positive_text:
Le confort, l’accueil du personnel et leurs conseil sur tout de vélo, randonné et présentation de l’hôtel.
Hôtel de 25 chambres donc silencieux et respectueux
L'emplacement est top, l'hôtel est magnifique, le personnel est très professionnel. Nous avons dîner au restaurant de l'hôtel, c'était délicieux !!
reviews.negative_text:
Seul petit bémol, le calme dans les chambres n'est pas top, on entends vraiment beaucoup dans le couloir. Et concernant le spa, l'eau était beaucoup trop chloré, impossible d'apprécier ce moment, nos yeux piquaient à peine arrivé. Il faut revoir le système de nettoyage de l'eau je pense.
Ces 2 petits points négatif non pas du tout entaché le séjour, nous reviendrons si nous revenons sur Annecy
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Le petit déjeuner était très bien et copieux avec assez de choix à mon sens. Concernant la partie restaurant c'était également très bon avec des produits de qualité. reviews.review_title: Bel hôtel avec une très belle vue sur le lac, personnel particulièrement accueillant et gentil
reviews.positive_text: Belle vue, jolie chambres, personnel exceptionnellement agréable et prévenant

L´emplacement est top par rapport à Annecy, au lac ainsi que la piste cyclable juste en contre bas. 
Le personnel est super, accueillant et souriant, et ils trouvent des solutions en cas de soucis autant que possible. 
Les chambres sont belles et spacieuses, le restaurant, que ce soit pour le petit déjeuner, le dîner ou le bar est excellent. 

La vue est imprenable sur le lac, la location de paddle et de vélos est également une excellente chose.
reviews.negative_text:
Nous n´avons pas eu de chance avec le temps, de ce fait nous sommes beaucoup restés à l´hôtel. Il manque peut-être quelques aménagements concernant la salle de sport, ainsi que quelques jeux type échecs seraient les bienvenus pour les journées pluvieuses, mais ce serait un plus  ! 

Le seul hic a été l´eau chaude dans la chambre. Extrêmement longue à arriver parfois, nous devions ouvrir la douche et les deux robinets à fond pendant de longues minutes (parfois 5 à 10 minutes ) pour avoir de l'eau chaude. Le personnel nous a expliqué que c'était dû au fait qu'il y avait peu de monde et donc peu de tirage dans l´hôtel. Nous le comprenons, mais c'est néanmoins un peu gênant.

reviews.positive_text: Confort chambre, petit déjeuner, restaurant, au bord du lac, piscine extérieure, gentillesse personnel, parking aisé et gratuit, animal compagnie bien accueilli
reviews.negative_text: Carte restaurant un peu courte

reviews.review_title: Un excellent séjour et un très bon souvenir !
reviews.positive_text:
Petit-déjeuner excellent et très varié.
Nous avons diné sur place les deux soirs de notre séjour.
Les mets proposés sont de belle qualité.
Mention spéciale pour la responsable du restaurant dont l'accueil est irréporochable.
La situation de la terrasse (avec vue sur le lac) est exceptionnelle.
La piscine et les jardins sont magnifiques et superbement entretenus
reviews.negative_text:
Un bémol pour les prix des vins au verre (au bar et au restaurant) : 13€ !!!
Idem pour le prix des petits-déjeuners : 35€
C'est évidemment proportionnel à la qualité d'ensemble de l'établissement.

reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Accueil exceptionnelle, chambre magnifique, restaurant excellent, emplacement parfait

L'emplacement tout près du lac avec une vue à couper le souffle. L'accès facile et direct pour s'installer au bord du lac et y nager. La propreté impeccable et le très bon état des infrastructures. La très belle piscine et les différents emplacements dans le jardin sont  très appréciables. La gentillesse du personnel : excellent accueil à notre arrivée avec visite guidée de l'hotel, équipe du restaurant très avenante, dame de ménage très dévouée et arrangeante. Au final, un très bel hôtel, où toutes les conditions sont réunies pour pouvoir se ressourcer.
reviews.negative_text:
Le prix des consommations. Notamment le tarif de 35 euros pour un petit-déjeuner qui est excessif.

Des voisins de chambre bruyants : trois petits chiens enfermés dont l'un aboyait beaucoup jusque tard le soir parce que laissés seuls. Leur porte de chambre que ces voisins laissaient claquer sans la retenir à chaque fois qu'ils entraient ou quittaient leur chambre. Nous avons aussi été surpris de voir que plusieurs locataires montaient leur vélo en chambre et, pour l'un, le rangeait sur le balcon (vélo visible d'en-bas, à travers le garde-corps vitré du balcon).
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

Le personnel est aux petits soins, l'on se sent comme chez soi.
Situation parfaite en direct sur le lac avec une piscine chauffée et une terrasse très agréable.
L'hôtel a été super arrangeant pour la restitution des chambres et s'est adapté à notre grand groupe famille/amis pour le déjeuner. Nous avons passé un we super Cocoon au calme, très agréable et reposant, un SPA très sympa et des vélos électriques parfaits pour faire le tour du lac.

reviews.positive_text:
Bel endroit en face du lac a coté de la voix verte, 10 mn de vélo du centre d'Annecy, ça va !
Personnels aux petits soins et vraiment agréables.
Petit déjeuner au top !
Un cocktail (bravo pour la carte) en fin de soirée dans le jardin et c'est superbe.
reviews.negative_text:
Musique trop présente. On avait réservé une chambre avec une belle terrasse donnant sur le lac, mais cette "ambiance" sonore a un peu gâché le plaisir.
De 8h à 23h, n'est-ce pas trop ? surtout à a un volume suffisant pour l'entendre dans la chambre. Dommage, donc une note de 9 seulement ... mais facile à améliorer :-)

L'hôtel se revendique comme un 5 étoiles et c'est loin d'être le cas.
Le petit déjeuner est très standard par rapport à d'autres hôtels, mais coute 29 euros par personne, ce qui pour ce que c'est, est hors de prix.
A la commande d'un room service, un fee de 12 euros est imposé, c'est assez unique et une première et je voyage beaucoup. La chambre est agréable mais pas du niveau d'un 5 étoiles à plus de 350 euros. Nous avons eu un peu l'impression d'être des moutons devant impérativement être tondus. Très désagréable. Je passe aussi sur le manque de professionnalisme de certains membres du personnel. ( Une réservation pour le restaurant alors que le restaurant est fermé ...). Première et dernière fois

confortable et irréprochable  
petit déjeuner de qualité  , produits faits maison  ( surtout les madeleines )
emplacement certainement un des meilleurs du Lac 
personnel charmant et aux petits soins
restauration de qualité 
..... un sans faute !
reviews.negative_text: objectivement on a tout apprécié

reviews.positive_text: Magnifique hôtel idéalement placé au bord du lac loin de l’agitation mais proche d’Annecy.
reviews.negative_text: rien

reviews.positive_text: la localisation la taille et l’accueil
reviews.negative_text: rien de particulier

reviews.review_title: Un havre de paix côté lac
reviews.positive_text: L’emplacement est très agréable; la vue sur le lac est reposante.
reviews.negative_text: rien

reviews.review_title: Excellent week-end, nous reviendrons à coup sûr
reviews.positive_text: vue sur le lac, accessibilité au lac.Petit déjeuner, dîner et piscine extérieure + activités proposées
reviews.negative_text:
Sauna trop petit et un ne fonctionner pas..
le tarif du petit-déjeuner élevé.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.review_title: Amazing staff very professional and caring. Great location. Potential for greatness :-)
reviews.positive_text:
Staff very professional and helpful.
Location is great with a great view over the lake.
Trees and garden amazing bonus for kids / babies.
Charging station for EV is convenient.
reviews.negative_text:
Mattresses are very soft. apparently across all the rooms.
Mini fridge was not working properly: was not able to cool down items.
No ramp to go down the lake / cycling, running path - a challenge for stroller or / and wheel chair.
Coming out of the parking can be tricky as you have a blind corne: challenge to see cars coming from your left handsome: may be a flashing light to set up to warn traffic of exiting vehicles from the parking?

reviews.positive_text: Nice spa, lovely view over the lake, breakfast was good
reviews.negative_text: Further from Annecy than anticipated, nothing much around other than the hotel.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text: Wonderfully situated, right in front of the lake. Very good option to take a free boat to get to another hotel for lunch or dinner.
reviews.negative_text:
The suite Barnaby was rather small for a family of 4.
Absolutely doesn’t value for money.

reviews.positive_text: Staff was excellent, nice spa ,good bar and room is nice size clean clean location. It’s nice. It’s quite a walk to the town.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text:
Staff was fantastic, helpful, courteous; and personable. 
Pool area and view excellent.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text:
The location, food, atmosphere and lovely staff made my stay so so enjoyable.
The facilities are fantastic but I didn't use them much as the lake is right on the doorstep and that in itself is a fantastic asset.

I cannot recommend enough. 
I will absolutely return 😍
reviews.negative_text: The phone and also the hairdryer in Sacha room didn't work during my stay - (minor minor inconveniences 😊)
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.review_title: Nice location, confortable rooms, but serious lack of trees and shade.
reviews.positive_text: The location was good. There were some armchairs and pamlags in the shade which were very confortable, even to work a bit. The view from there was fantastic. The pool area was convenient after 5 o c'clock, before that time there was no shade there and the sun was burning. We liked the bar snacks such as the salads and a local cheese and little pieces of pastas together. The lake is wonderful and its water is very pleasant and clean. My husband liked the sauna.
reviews.negative_text: They wanted to charge EUR 35 per person for the breakfast - we did not find that worthwhile. There are not enough trees in the garden. This is why there is no enough shade. People tried to escape from the burning sun but there were only few sufficient options. The lake are was OK, but there were no deckchairs we could only sit on the ground. There are not too many benches there. The deckghairs in the pool area are not confortable due to the hot tempretaure, the burning sun and the lack of shades. We had once a dinner in the hotel. It is considered as a sort of fine dineng. We had similar experienec in different countries earlier. This one we found low value/price, while the lady was pushing us to order more vine and more food.

reviews.review_title: Breathtaking view, very good food, quiet and comfortable with a team of young, friendly professional staff
reviews.positive_text: The location and the view
reviews.negative_text: Crowded around the pool - not enough sun loungers.  More use should be made of the garden in front of pool.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Great location
reviews.negative_text: Make sure you book breakfast if you intend to eat in the morning at the hotel, 35€ for scrambled eggs is steep.

reviews.positive_text: Location was excellent.
reviews.negative_text: We didn’t enjoy our meal in the restaurant, and thought it was considerably overpriced. We ate there the first night, but didn’t return. The breakfast was very good but again overpriced at 35 euros pp.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Fine food, nice place/location, nice walk along the board of the lake
reviews.negative_text: the view out of the room toowards the street

reviews.review_title: An excellent hotel with high class facilities, stunning location and very good staff.
reviews.positive_text: The location close to the lake, and our room overlooking the lake, were memorable features. The outside facilities are attractive and comprehensive, and the dining room offered an excellent menu. Staff were very friendly and efficient
reviews.negative_text: We have no complaints
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Matress very comfortable, amazing pool inside and outside
reviews.negative_text: Bathroom small,  waterproof not effective, soundproof not effective due to Road (room on forest)

reviews.review_title: Beautiful location and comfortable room, but a bit expensive for only four-star quality.
reviews.positive_text: Exceptional location by the lake, overlooking the bike path. Very nice heated pool (26C) and terrace. Good spa with large sauna and hammam and modest indoor pool (28C). The room and balcony were lovely - light and spacious.
reviews.negative_text: Many minor points that showed a lack of attention to maintenance including poor ventilation in the bathroom, which smelled a bit moldy. The WiFi in the room hardly worked - not at all for our phones and only very slowly with a computer. Two electricity sockets in the room didn't work and neither did several lights in the garden. In the spa, there were puddles by the entrance for no apparent reason. One shower head sprayed water on the ceiling and the pool had a high chlorine level while not being especially warm. Not critical, but it's not really a five star hotel.

reviews.review_title: A clean, welcoming hotel. Cute and quirky theme. Great location.
reviews.positive_text: Very clean and well presented.
reviews.negative_text: The spa was a little small. No jacuzzi. Bit pricey when comparing to the competition.

reviews.review_title: Lovely location breakfast too expensive for the quality
reviews.positive_text: The location and facilities were excellent. Most of the staff were helpful and very polite
reviews.negative_text: The breakfast is seriously over priced for what you get

reviews.positive_text: Pool and location view to the lake
reviews.negative_text: Room with view for the lake not quite front for the lake

reviews.review_title: Quality hotel but could improve - not great value
reviews.positive_text:
Lovely pool area and chilled vibe 
Nice drinks
Friendly, Skilled and very professional staff
reviews.negative_text: Room wasn't as described (forest view) was actually a car park view . Curtains did not fit windows. Shower took ages to get warm. Also on the small side for a suite. Didn't enjoy the restaurant food.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text:
Location 
Staff
reviews.negative_text:
Spa facilities 
Swimming pool 
Food price

reviews.review_title: An outstanding property with beautiful grounds against an enviable lake & mountain view:)
reviews.positive_text: The location was amazing.  The facilities were great!  Our lake view suites exceeded expectations.  The pool and lounging with beautiful backdrop was my favorite part definitely a place to completely relax.  Loved the close proximity to Annecy.  We took the train from Paris to Annecy. Black Bass is a 10 minute taxi ride and a 20 minute bike ride.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast & dinner on hotel property was very pricey.  The dinner the first night was outstanding and made up for the cost.  The steam room was not open and working in the spa area we tried to use the sauna and that was not turned on for use 2 days in a row when made mgmt aware we were told the sauna would be turned on within 10 minutes that didn't happen not a game changer but it was a disappointment considering it was a service provided alongside a beautiful indoor spa pool to not be able to experience both was a bummer.

reviews.positive_text: Reception lovely. Position on the lake was beautiful. Breakfast was good.
reviews.negative_text: Room although large had an awkwardly slanted roof. This posed a problem if you needed to go to the bathroom at night.

reviews.positive_text:
- Very nice location by the lake, approx 40 min by foot from Annecy
- Indoor swimming pool is a big plus, esp. in the region
- The hotel staff is nice
- Room was spacious
reviews.negative_text:
- The room with "Forrest View" actually has a view on the parking lot. The windows are small thus the room is quite dark. 
- The bathroom is not comfortable : the shower has no door and soaks the entire bathroom floor. 
- Breakfast is way too simple, and overpriced for 29 euros
- The housekeeper entered without knocking at 8.30am, 2 days in a row
- The hotel is nice, but is much rather a 4* than a 5* : the experience is overpriced and not good value for money.

reviews.review_title: We enjoyed our stay ... we would come again.
reviews.positive_text:
we liked the food and the wellness...
we liked the quietness...
overall we felt very good there...
reviews.negative_text: all the rooms are named after kids & grandkids of the owner BUT there is NOTHING for kids in the hotel...that is the only minus point really...
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.review_title: A beautiful hotel, absolutely stunning location, just perfect!
reviews.positive_text: What a beautiful hotel! Stunning lake view from our room, the room itself was a good size, very clean and super comfortable. The staff at the hotel were so friendly and helpful, nothing was too much trouble. The access to the lake and the lakeside path was so easy and we enjoyed some lovely walks along the footpath. The indoor pool was amazing!
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Perfect in every way. Beautiful view, excellent and friendly service. Great e-bikes to rent for an easy ride to Annecy old town. Beautiful spa and indoor and outdoor pools. Excellent food at the restaurant.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Views and attentiveness of staff.
reviews.negative_text: Expensive - room, food and drinks.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.review_title: Such a great facility in an amazing location
reviews.positive_text: The location, cleanness, hospitality
reviews.negative_text: N/A

reviews.positive_text: Restaurant, bar and spa facilities were all great. Having a hotel with lake access and bike path just at the end of the grounds was fab. Staff are super helpful.
reviews.negative_text: NOTHING!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful hotel, great location, would stay again!
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful hotel, lovely rooms and poolside area, very friendly staff. Location just outside Annecy, right on the lake, much nicer than staying in the town.
reviews.negative_text: No air conditioning in the gym.

reviews.positive_text:
Staff was above expectations, special thanks to Julian and all team for the great welcoming and support. Great location, close to Annecy Lake and Old Town ,
Toilet has shattaf.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast was good, but it could be better if they add more choices.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.review_title: Relaxing, stunning location, would like to have stayed longer !
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful location, friendly staff.
reviews.negative_text: Very low ceilings in our room, hit our heads several times

reviews.review_title: Amazing stay, with or without kids. Instant holiday feeling.
reviews.positive_text: Very friendly staff. Restaurant is very good. Easy going and relaxed atmosphere. Child friendly. Wonderful view on the lake.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.review_title: Stunning hotel and we’d definitely stay again
reviews.positive_text:
Stunning views & decor. Location excellent right on the lake path and an easy walk in to Annecey. 
Room was very comfortable. 
All of the staff we encountered were thoroughly lovely.
reviews.negative_text:
Minor points only, as we loved our stay overall. 
Breakfast was quite pricey at 35 euro, but it was delicious and the setting is so beautiful.
There was very little drink service around the pool, went inside and there was nobody at the bar either, took a while to get served. We spent approx 5 hours by the pool / on the grass and were only offered drinks once. 
Room service options of an evening extremely limited (on a Sunday night with a young baby we had hoped to enjoy this, but it was basically cheese platter or desserts only). Expect a reduced menu but not that limited.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text:
View 
Friendly stuff

reviews.review_title: The perfect stopover, that could also last longer…
reviews.positive_text: Top Personal, fantastisches Essen

What a location ! What amazing, friendly staff! What a view and lovely rooms. Can’t fault this hotel at all. The spa is wonderful and the restaurant is excellent too. Breakfast was included and was superb. Will be back again!!
reviews.negative_text: Nothing.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text:
nice Hotel and its obvious that the management is making sure everything is PERFECT.
the parking is good with enough space and easy access, the staff is really helpful and cooperative.
the lake view is remarkable day and night and you can go to the shores in a min from your room.
i highly recommend this hotel
The stag were were so helpful, professional, i can’t wait to go back to the hotel.
reviews.negative_text: The fact i had to leave

reviews.positive_text: Scenery was awesome, staff were excellent and very helpful
reviews.negative_text: That the outdoor pool was empty 😀

The staff is very friendly and kind yet professional! 
Very good location with a nice view

reviews.negative_text: Nothing!

reviews.positive_text: excellent place to stay! Very recommended!

reviews.review_title: I like this hotel because of the staff
reviews.positive_text: Very clean and friendly staff with very good reception, Julian and another woman gave me cappuccino before checking out ( I don’t remember her name ) they are very nice people.
reviews.negative_text: Cleanness, care,facilities.

reviews.review_title: Relaxing, beautiful stay with nice tranquil vibes
reviews.positive_text: small boutique with nice amenities and great location! Spa was the perfect touch and provided a relaxing environment.
reviews.negative_text: Pricey restaurant for dinner but delicious food. Definitely recommend snacking or doing lunch

reviews.review_title: Perfect hotel on the lake shore
reviews.positive_text:
Perfect stay in wonderful place. 
The hotel just on the lake shore with the picturesque view. The staff super friendly, we were upgraded for free and as I had my birthday they presented me a cake with a candle. 
Spa-zone with pool, hamam and sauna. 
We will definitely come back.
reviews.negative_text: Everything was perfect

reviews.positive_text: Everything in the hotel was amazing

reviews.review_title: Money can’t buy manners or taste
reviews.positive_text: On the lake, that’s all.
reviews.negative_text: The staff, the lack of AC, the rudeness of employees, lack of working fridge etc.

reviews.review_title: 5 star hotel, great location, would recommend.
reviews.positive_text: Very smart hotel, fantastic location, excellent facilities and staff. Expensive but very good breakfast.
The helpful nature of the staff
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.review_title: We stayed for 1 night - and were made to feel super welcome immediately. Nice sauna, indoor and outdoor pool, excellent
reviews.positive_text: wonderful location - beautiful view. hotel is modern but at the same time cosy

The hotel was really lovely, even better than I expected. Our room was really spacious and the decor really nice.  Comfortable bed, lovely big bathroom with a great shower.  From the rear of the hotel you can access a pathway where you can walk alongside the lake.
Superb location on the lake, beautiful & comfortable accommodation! Exceptional service!

reviews.positive_text: the relaxing atmosphere were incredibly rejuvenating and it was really well located, the spa was amazing and so quiet and the fitness equipment (whilst limited) was very much appreciated
reviews.negative_text: the breakfast was very expensive (too expensive for us to try) and they forgot to dry clean my suit

reviews.review_title: Great hotel in a perfect location
reviews.positive_text: The staff went out of their way when they heard it was our honeymoon!

reviews.positive_text: Very friendly and well run hotel
reviews.negative_text: Dinner menu was very limited and quite expensive

reviews.review_title: We booked our next stay before leaving
reviews.positive_text: Location, cleanliness and facilities
reviews.negative_text: It was a rainy day when we first arrived.😄

reviews.review_title: Stunning hotel in a stunning setting - we will return next year!
reviews.positive_text: Relaxed luxury, serene and stunning setting, great facilities, beautiful food and staff who provide wonderful service.
reviews.negative_text: The room was a little on the small side but it’s a minor point considering all the positives!
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.review_title: A wonderful stay and we would stay again although cost would be a factor
reviews.positive_text: All excellent, great staff, room and location.
reviews.negative_text: It's expensive!

reviews.review_title: stunning pool views and great room
reviews.positive_text: stunning property and location. small gifts left in the room for the little one was a great touch
reviews.negative_text: very expensive to eat and drink here

reviews.positive_text: Everything
reviews.negative_text: Small double room, should have taken a suite

reviews.positive_text:
Staff were brilliant
Room was excellent
Food high quality
reviews.negative_text: It is expensive
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Pool amd spa were top draw. View of the lake from the garden was fab. Handy access to the lakeside path and cycle route too.
reviews.negative_text: n/a
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text: Superb service and attention to detail. Food in the restaurant is world class.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: The hotel is located in a really nice location with a beautiful view of the lake. The staff were really nice and helpful, specially Ms. Klimos who was always there and tried her best for a memorable stay for us. The restaurant is amazing, the chef and his team prepared us a perfect birthday cake for our two year old son, which was nice and delicious. A fun thing about the hotel was that the rooms were named after people of the family who I guess owned the place.
reviews.negative_text: I had booked a lake view room, but our room was almost parking view. the tv room had the view of the lake but the bedroom was in the back and almost always dark due to the trees which were between our windows and parking. At checkin I asked for another room but they said that they are fully booked and no other room was available!

reviews.review_title: Wonderful hotel with great staff and excellent location.
reviews.positive_text: The hotel was amazing. Our room was a junior suite and we had a lovely terrace out to the garden and overlooking the beautiful lake. The decor in the room was lovely and fresh. The staff were so friendly and helpful- we asked for various things to the room and they helped within minutes.
reviews.negative_text: I would have preferred a little fence/boundary between our terrace and the room next door.

reviews.positive_text: The staff was super friendly, the hamam was lovely and the room was adorable.
reviews.negative_text: Sometimes the hamam wasn't turned on when I had reserved it

reviews.review_title: Relaxing stay in a top class hotel.
reviews.positive_text: This is a lovely hotel, relaxed and modern ambience with excellent facilities. We loved the food and the Spa. The location is perfect with lake views and easy access to activities.
reviews.negative_text: Small issue with hot water; staff apologetic and gave us a free breakfast.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.review_title: Would pass this hotel for the many other lake-front hotels near Annecy
reviews.positive_text: Breakfast was good, but too expensive (35 EUR) per person per day. We were 4, so there went 140 EUR. The rooms were large and nicely decorated. The room was spotless and the bed was comfy.
reviews.negative_text: We were overcharged 100 EUR at the restaurant. They added an extra wine and desserts we did not order. When I mentioned this to the server, she did not apologise at all. She said "I'll be back with the correct bill." When she came back, again no apology. She said "Can you please check this bill?" In the US, we would have gotten an apology and perhaps some free goodies. In Japan, the manager of the restaurant would have apologised personally and bowed. Here, we were treated very bad. After I said that the second check was correct, she asked me "Where are you from?"... What does that matter??? Are you a racist overcharging depending on origin?
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text:
Excellent hotel with amazing views and friendly staff.
Dog friendly and able to take our dog into restaurant for Breakfast and Evening meal.
Hotel backs onto cyle path so plenty of places to take the dog.
Walk into Annecy is 50 mins using the cycle path. 
Breakfast was nice but expensive.
Rooms were amazing.
Would definitely stay again.
Onsite parking with EV chargers
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.review_title: Definitely not a 5 star hotel experience
reviews.positive_text: Location, food quality - dinner was delicious, spacious rooms, comfortable beds & bathrobes, outdoor pool area
reviews.negative_text:
The ground keeping-weeds everywhere that made the place look very messy.
Although friendly, extremely slow service, had to go to the bar to actually ask someone to come and collect drinks order with only one other couple in the lounge area at the time. Waited ages to order drinks at the dinner time too, forgotten to offer bread and plates not cleared after we finished eating more than 10 minutes (restaurant had 6 tables in…).
Disposable toiletries in the room were already opened and some half used.

reviews.review_title: I would recommend this hotel for visitors to Lake Annecy
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful location and very nice rooms
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast and bike rentals were pricey
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.review_title: Disappointed, should have space available for guests to dine in their restaurant
reviews.positive_text: Pool was nice
reviews.negative_text: Apparently they had no space in. The restaurant for us, looked empty to me. Very disappointing

reviews.positive_text: Small, elegant, friendly, excellent lakeside location, restaurant
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Pictures did not do the property justice! It was a fantastic hotel..fantastic location, great interiors, comfy nights sleep, delicious cocktails & the most amazing food! But the staff made the stay memorable and couldn’t do enough for us!!

reviews.review_title: A great hotel at a great location, but just skip the breakfast.
reviews.positive_text: The hotel is very well placed and the rooms are clean, quiet spacious and well furnished. The lake facing rooms have a great view. The staff are very friendly and fluent in English. The exterior pool was small but very nice to be in and they provided towels on demand without any hassle. They also have other services like bicycles and sup with extra charges.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast was expensive and not very well suited for vegans like me. The mini-bar refrigerator wasn't working and the assortments (not-free) were not clearly marked, so some family members were confused and opened them. Near the pool, they decided to place a lot of plants that had flowers, resulting in a large number of bees and wasps (some kids even got stung).
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text: Beautiful views. Spacious rooms. Lovely staf. Great food. Refreshing heated pool.
reviews.negative_text: Road into annecy is always hammed. Fortunately the hotel has bikes. Next time we’ll use them.

reviews.review_title: Simply amazing. The location is incredible and the staff were fantastic
reviews.positive_text: The location was fantastic, simply stunning. The staff we're brilliant, super friendly and always on hand to help with anything that we needed.
reviews.negative_text: A lake view would have been amazing, as our 'forest' view was a bit limited, but we didn't pay for a lake view so we can't complain about this.

reviews.positive_text: Lovely
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.negative_text: Our room was near a utility and noise came through the wall.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Everyone on staff (front desk, room cleaners, restaurant waiters. Bar tender) was absolutely amazing. They were hospitable, friendly, and professional. The room was lovely, with tasteful decor and nice amenities. I ordered the full tasting menu in the restaurant and every dish was fantastic. I absolutely loved the flavor combinations. I tried two different cocktails over my stay, with Clement (the bartender) making me a drink of his choice each time. They were delicious! Rubin, my waiter, also gave me recommendations for local events that were helpful. Wonderful stay & I would love to come back in future.

The view from our hotel room, over the lake, made this worth every penny. Staff were very helpful and the whole place was pet friendly. Sitting out on the terrace in the evening was lovely and plenty of places to walk the dog (the hotel backs onto a cycle path that's between the hotel and lake).
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text:
the staff and service are amaaazing! 
the view is incredible!
reviews.negative_text: nothing, only the food at the restaurant wasn’t up to our standards ( however we are chefs ) so we have high standards in food.

reviews.positive_text: Everything was perfect. Very friendly staff.

reviews.review_title: Underwhelming for a five star hotel
reviews.positive_text: Nice location on the lake. Easy access to the lake. Outdoor terrace area, grounds and swimming pool.
reviews.negative_text: Bit too far to walk into Annecy. Breakfast was expensive.

reviews.positive_text: Mooie lokatie
reviews.negative_text: Niet heel persoonlijke sfeer

reviews.positive_text: Lage
reviews.negative_text: Das Zimmer war viel zu klein für den Preis. Und der Service wat ok aber nicht mehr.

reviews.positive_text:
Een fantastische lokatie, direct aan het meer. Achteruitgang met een pad om een mooie wandeling te maken. Eigen en gratis parkeerterrein. Ik heb genoten van de Spa, hoewel tijdens onze dagen de hamam niet werkte. Honden toegelaten (20 euro per hond per dag). Een ontbijt om nooit meer te vergeten.

Een nadeel is de geluidsisolatie. Het schuiven van de stoelen in de kamers is zeer luidruchtig. Tevens werd er naast ons harde muziek gespeeld, wat zeer goed hoorbaar was. Wij sliepen tegen een muur, waar het toilet van buren zat. 
Een keer was onze kamer niet schoongemaakt, wij moesten een half uur wachten, het was netjes geweest, als wij iets aangeboden hadden gekregen.

Het heeft 5 sterren door de faciliteiten, niet mede door de service.
reviews.room_name: Chambre avec Balcon - Vue sur Lac

reviews.positive_text: Parte dos quartos bem nova, moderna.
reviews.negative_text: Cama pequena, jardim por fazer, cafe da manha deixa a desejar, não é aconchegante.

Das Personal im Empfang Donnerstags (junge Dame mit schwarzen Haaren und ein junger Mann) und Freitags (die gleiche junge Dame wie am Donnerstag und eine weitere mit blonden Haaren) waren mehr als ausgezeichnet. Sie waren auffallend freundlich und zuvorkommend; Sie waren richtig nett und angenehm.

Hingegen ist bei dem Herr der für das Frühstück zuständig war noch sehr viel Luft nach oben.

reviews.review_title: traumhafte Lage direkt am See mit tollem Pool und Aussenanlage, Zimmer zu klein und zu teuer
reviews.positive_text: Traumhafte Lage direkt am See, nur der Fahrradweg trennt das Hotel vom See, toller Blick vom Pool auf See und umliegende Berge, tolle Aussenanlage. Sehr nettes Personal. Man kann sich E-Bikes vom Hotel ausleihen und direkt am Fahrradweg starten. Kostenloser öffentlicher Bus nach Annency und zurück, damit ist man in 10 Minuten im Zentrum
reviews.negative_text: Zimmer viel zu klein, kaum Möglichkeit, Kleidung aus dem Koffer zu nehmen, dafür viel zu teuer. Frühstück 35 Euro pro Person, haben wir deshalb nicht genutzt.

Keine Kleiderhaken, noch im Bad, noch in der Garderobe.
Im Restaurant(viel zu teuer und keine Auswahl)wurde STÄNDIG ein-oder abgedeckt!

reviews.review_title: Ik ha er niet nog een keer heen.

reviews.negative_text: Duur, er moest direct bij het boeken worden betaald via een link terwijl ik had geboekt via Booking; als gevolg daarvan bedrag 2 x afgeschreven en werd pas na 5 dagen teruggestort. Verder stond er een diner op de factuur die we niet hadden genuttigd; slechte zaak!

reviews.positive_text: prima ontbijt, zeer uitgebreid. vriendelijk peresoneel

reviews.positive_text: Alles hat uns gut gefallen. Die Lage am See, das Frühstück , das Zimmer, der Service . Wir haben mit unseren Hund übernachtet. Es gab einen Napf für Essen und Trinken und eine Hundedecke.

reviews.review_title: Schönes Hotel um Annecy und die Umgebung zu entdecken.

reviews.negative_text: Leider gab es in dem Zimmer fast keine Ablage für die Kleider. Dass man für Wellness einen Termin buchen muss.

reviews.positive_text: Die Aussicht ist atemberaubend, direkt am See gelegen. Die Strasse, obwohl direkt hinter dem Hotel und sehr stark befahren, ist absolut nicht hörbar. Der beheizte Pool ist vor allem für diese Jahreszeit sehr wichtig und schön. Annecey ist nur einige Minuten mit dem Auto bzw. mit dem Fahrrad entfernt. Das Restaurant ist korrekt.

Excelente ubicación. Muy bonita vista. Muy
buen servicio en general.
reviews.negative_text:
El desayuno podría ofrecer más variedad (english beans, yogurt natural, café más grande). 
La habitación era muy
bonita pero podría tener más
mueblería, no hay ni un estante donde dejar cosas, en la entrada ni un lugar para sentarse , quitarse los zapatos). La piscina de interior podría estar en mejores condiciones.

reviews.review_title: Wir haben unseren mehrtägigen Aufenthalt über Silvester sehr genossen, vielen Dank!
reviews.positive_text: Das Personal war sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Das Hotel ist sauber, die Zimmer geräumig und gemütlich. Die Lage ermöglicht mit dem Seeanstoss, den umliegenden Bergen und dem nahegelegenen schönen Städtchen Annecy sehr viele Ausflugsoptionen und Aktivitäten.

reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la Forêt

reviews.positive_text:
I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Annecy!

It has an excellent location right in front of the lake, and they offer free parking, which is a huge plus.

The hospitality and service were exceptional—quick and very welcoming.

They also have unique names for the rooms instead of just numbers, which gives the place a warm and personalized feel.

As soon as you arrive, someone greets you, gives you a tour of the hotel, showing all the services like the spa, gym, restaurant, swimming pool and your room. They also welcome you with a cake and take care of your luggage.

There's a small gym and renting electric bikes as well for those who want to stay active during their stay. Although the room's ceiling was a bit low due to the unique roof design, it added a cozy touch.

***** Additionally, for Muslim travelers, there's a water hose in the toilet, which is very convenient.

Overall, a great place to stay!

Special thanks to Julien, Giulia, Jolan and Ilina for your kindness

أنصح بشدة بهذا الفندق لأي شخص يزور أنسي!

يتمتع بموقع ممتاز أمام بحيرة آنسي، ويوفر مواقف مجانية للسيارات وتأجير الدراجات.
كانت الضيافة والخدمة استثنائية – سريعة ومرحبة للغاية.

يوجد صالة رياضية صغيرة لمن يرغب في ممارسة الرياضة خلال الإقامة.

على الرغم من أن سقف الغرفة كان منخفضًا قليلاً بسبب التصميم الفريد للسقف، إلا أنه أضاف لمسة دافئة ومريحة.

أيضًا، يتميز الفندق بأن الغرف لها أسماء خاصة بدلاً من الأرقام فقط، مما يضفي شعورًا دافئًا وشخصيًا.

بالإضافة إلى ذلك، يوجد شطاف ماء في الحمام، وهو مريح جدًا للمسافرين المسلمين. بشكل عام، إنه مكان رائع للإقامة!

reviews.positive_text:
Der Empfang war freundlich und hilfsbereit, das Abendessen ganz ausgezeichnet, das Frühstück ok, das Personal am Abend sehr gut geschult und zuvorkommend, beim Frühstück weniger aufmerksam. 
Wunderschöne Lage, großartiger Blick, der Garten lädt zum Entspannen ein, die Spaziermöglichkeiten mit einem Hund sind ideal. Die ebenerdige Suite war chic und sehr gut ausgestattet, leider war die aircondition nicht sehr effizient.
